desc.cn: ngrok 是一种全球分布式反向代理，无论您在何处运行应用程序和网络服务，都可以保护和加速您的应用程序和网络服务。
desc.en: ngrok is a globally distributed reverse proxy that secures, protects and accelerates your applications and network services, no matter where you run them.

debian/apt.cmd:
curl -sSL https://ngrok-agent.s3.amazonaws.com/ngrok.asc \
  | sudo tee /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/ngrok.asc >/dev/null \
  && echo "deb https://ngrok-agent.s3.amazonaws.com buster main" \
  | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ngrok.list \
  && sudo apt update \
  && sudo apt install ngrok
